name: Spectral
summary: Spectral is an American military science fiction film directed by Nic Mathieu. The screenplay was written by Ian Fried, Mathieu, and George Nolfi from a screen story by Fried. The film stars James Badge Dale, Max Martini, Emily Mortimer, and Bruce Greenwood. The film was released on December 9, 2016 on Netflix
